title: Blood test to diagnose heart attacks is flawed, warn researchers

title_detail.value: Blood test to diagnose heart attacks is flawed, warn researchers

summary: The blood test used to diagnose a heart attack (acute myocardial infarction) in patients admitted to hospital can be misleading, warn researchers in a new study.

summary_detail.value: The blood test used to diagnose a heart attack (acute myocardial infarction) in patients admitted to hospital can be misleading, warn researchers in a new study.
